scripts.watch: mkdirp dist && watchify -v -d src/seidel.js -s seidel -o dist/seidel.dev.js
scripts.build-dev: mkdirp dist && browserify -d src/seidel.js -s seidel > dist/seidel.dev.js
scripts.build-min: mkdirp dist && browserify src/seidel.js -s seidel | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > dist/seidel.min.js
